Description.Title: RegisterZadok model
Description.Abstract: Record the zadok stage in the calendar

Input.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Input.name: calendarCumuls

Input.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Input.name: calendarMoments

Input.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Input.name: calendarDates

Input.description: true if the zadok stage has changed this time step
Input.name: hasZadokStageChanged_t1

Input.description: cumul TT from Anthesis to current date
Input.name: cumulTTFromZC_65

Input.description: Duration of the endosperm endoreduplication phase
Input.name: der

Input.description: Slope of the relationship between Haun stage at terminal spikelet and final leaf number
Input.name: slopeTSFLN

Input.description: Intercept of the relationship between Haun stage at terminal spikelet and final leaf number
Input.name: intTSFLN

Output.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Output.name: calendarCumuls

Output.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Output.name: calendarMoments

Output.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Output.name: calendarDates

Output.description: true if the zadok stage has changed this time step
Output.name: hasZadokStageChanged
